parameter.name: testcaseDesc

parameter.name: testcaseDesc

parameter.name: testcaseDesc
parameter.value: To Verify whether "Successfully authorised. Previous balance: 10.0000, New balance: 60.0000 and Bundle activated successfully" message is displayed on directly authorizing request using the admin login when ticket id is mandatory with validation in the CRM application.

parameter.name: testcaseDesc
parameter.value: To verify whether "Highlighted Fields are Mandatory" Error message is displayed when clicking authorize in the Staff topup page without entering values in the mandatory fields.

parameter.name: testcaseDesc
parameter.value: To verify whether "Invalid Ticket ID" Error message is displayed on giving invalid ticket id when ticket Id field is set as mandatory with validation in the Staff topup page of the CRM application.

parameter.name: testcaseDesc
parameter.value: To verify whether "Invalid Ticket ID" Error message is displayed on giving invalid ticket id when ticket Id field is set as non mandatory without validation in the Staff topup page of the CRM application.

parameter.name: testcaseDesc
parameter.value: To verify whether staff topup gets success with entering maximum chars in the text fields.

parameter.name: testcaseDesc
parameter.value: To verify whether staff topup gets success with entering minimum chars in the text fields.

parameter.name: testcaseDesc
parameter.value: To Verify whether From Data and To Date Picker displayes the Days based on the Values Configured for the Config Param FromToDate when Accessed by Admin.

parameter.name: testcaseDesc
parameter.value: To verify whether the logs are captured in the CRM service logs while accessing the voucher status page.

parameter.name: testcaseDesc
parameter.value: To verify whether "Call forwarding feature is disabled mode" error is displayed when CallForwardingMode config is set as 0 in the CRM application.

parameter.name: testcaseDesc
parameter.value: To verify whether the user is able to successfully activate call forwarding feature for Unconditional and the user is not able to enable other services like No Answer, Switched Off, Busy when Unconditional is enabled in the Call Forwarding page of the CRM application.

parameter.name: testcaseDesc
parameter.value: To verify whether the user is able to successfully activate call forwarding feature for No Answer, Switched Off and Busy in the Call Forwarding page of the CRM application.

parameter.name: testcaseDesc
parameter.value: To verify whether SS_Status in HLR_SUBS_CFWD_INFO is updated as 15 on enabling unconditional for already No Answer, Switched Off and Busy enabled msisdn in the Call Forwarding page of the CRM application.

parameter.name: testcaseDesc
parameter.value: To verify whether No Answer, Switched Off and Busy gets enabled on disabling Unconditional for which already Unconditional is enabled over No Answer, Switched Off and Busy enabled MSISDN in the Call Forward Page of the CRM application.

parameter.name: testcaseDesc
parameter.value: To verify whether "Highlighted Fields are Mandatory" error message is displayed on clicking OK without entering values in the Ticket ID and Reason field and `Invalid Ticket ID` Error message is displayed on entering invalid ticketid and reason and `Please select atleast one option` error message is displayed on Clicking Ok without enabling any call forward options and `Highlighted Fields are Mandatory` error message is displayed on clicking ok on enabling NO Answer without entering msisdn in the Forward to Msisdn field in the Call Forwarding page of the CRM application.

parameter.name: testcaseDesc
